title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Buffalo Creek, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Eric Virkler, “The rider is my son Adam Virkler at Buffalo Creek in Colorado, the specific trail is Blackjack. There are many features like this on this trail, testing out brakes. Riding in July before the downpour several hours later.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are […]

author: Kristi Benedict
